mapper.sql: PK_BS_PROV, PROV_CODE, BS_NAME, BS_CODE, BS_DESC, FULL_NAME, BS_SRC, FOREIGN_ID, DISPLAY_SEQ, PK_BS_PARENT, SERIESCODE, BS_TYPE, BS_VER, SEC_GRADE, INFLUENCE, SRV_RANGE, IMPORTANCE, MANAGE_URL, VENDOR, ADMIN_NAME, CONTACT_INFO, LOCATION, BS_BACKUP, SEC_ZONE, IS_DELETED, PK_CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, PK_MENDER, MEND_TIME_LAST
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from am_bs_prov
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into am_bs_prov (PK_BS_PROV, PROV_CODE, BS_NAME, BS_CODE, BS_DESC, FULL_NAME, BS_SRC, FOREIGN_ID, DISPLAY_SEQ, PK_BS_PARENT, SERIESCODE, BS_TYPE, BS_VER, SEC_GRADE, INFLUENCE, SRV_RANGE, IMPORTANCE, MANAGE_URL, VENDOR, ADMIN_NAME, CONTACT_INFO, LOCATION, BS_BACKUP, SEC_ZONE, IS_DELETED, PK_CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, PK_MENDER, MEND_TIME_LAST) values (#{pkBsProv,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsSrc,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{foreignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displaySeq,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{pkBsParent,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{seriescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{influence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srvRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsBackup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

PROV_CODE = #{record.provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BS_NAME = #{record.bsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BS_CODE = #{record.bsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update am_bs_prov set PROV_CODE = #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BS_NAME = #{bsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BS_CODE = #{bsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BS_DESC = #{bsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BS_SRC = #{bsSrc,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FOREIGN_ID = #{foreignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PK_BS_PARENT = #{pkBsParent,jdbcType=CHAR}, SERIESCODE = #{seriescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BS_TYPE = #{bsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BS_VER = #{bsVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEC_GRADE = #{secGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFLUENCE = #{influence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRV_RANGE = #{srvRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORTANCE = #{importance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_URL = #{manageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VENDOR = #{vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN_NAME = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_INFO = #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BS_BACKUP = #{bsBackup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEC_ZONE = #{secZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_MENDER = #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEND_TIME_LAST = #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_BS_PROV = #{pkBsProv,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.`PK_BS_PROV`,a.`BS_NAME`,a.`BS_CODE` FROM `am_bs_prov` a WHERE a.`PK_BS_PROV` NOT IN (SELECT b.`PK_BS_PROV` FROM`am_bs_group_prov` a,`am_bs_prov` b WHERE a.`PK_BS_PROV`=b.`PK_BS_PROV` AND a.`PK_BS_GROUP`=#{pkBsGroup})
AND a.`PROV_CODE`=#{provCode}

SELECT a.`PK_BS_PROV` AS first_id,a.`BS_NAME` AS first_name,b.`PK_BS_PROV` AS second_id,b.`BS_NAME` AS second_name FROM (SELECT a.* FROM`am_bs_prov` a WHERE a.`PK_BS_PARENT` IS NULL ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.* FROM`am_bs_prov` a WHERE a.`PK_BS_PARENT` IS NOT NULL ) b ON a.`PK_BS_PROV`=b.`PK_BS_PARENT`
